isis.stitle: Recall 04501 Reminder Notice - Bosch DiamondLife™ Zero Offset Pin Slide Hydraulic Disc Brakes on Certain Truck Models Built 10/28/1997 through 6/3/2002

recall.subject: Bosch DiamondLife™ Zero Offset Pin Slide Hydraulic Disc Brakes on Certain Truck Models Built 10/28/1997 through 6/3/2002

defect.para: THIS IS AN ISIS ONLY NOTIFICATION.
Please refer to the dealer letter G-04501-R2 for service instructions.

para.exhotlnk: Print ready (PDF file) copy of the dealer letter

defect.para: The brake system may experience calipers sticking in the applied position. When undetected, this condition may result in premature brake component wear, excessive or abnormal heat generation at one or more of the wheel ends, or a wheel end fire, possibly resulting in property damage, personal injury, or death.

ownernote.para: This letter is to inform you that the owners of suspect vehicles who have not completed the Recall Service Procedure have been sent a reminder to schedule an appointment to have the service performed.
We appreciate your patience and cooperation regarding this campaign and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
